TopicTitle: Cannot select debris at KSC in the Tracking Station unless camera is moved inside Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit (10.0, Build 19045) | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D 8-Core Processor (16 CPUs) | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 | RAM: 32768 MB

 

Severity: Low, workaround is moving the camera inside Kerbin. A little more severe if this also occurs with vessels

Frequency: Medium, very consistent

Description: After launch there is often debris at KSC which needs to be cleared. I think it's possible to recover this debris (LSEs?) from VAB before launching a new vehicle, but sometimes I'm in the tracking station and want to get rid of it to clear icons from the screen. However, to select this debris from the Tracking Station, it's not possible from normal camera position; instead you must manouevre the camera inside of Kerbin, and from this position you can look 'out' at KSC to select the debris.
